short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Play ESPN Arcade Baseball game on chrome. ESPN Arcade Baseball online game. Created for ESPN Arcade Baseball fans.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Get ready to hit a home run in ESPN Arcade Baseball, an exciting online game designed by ESPN for baseball enthusiasts. The game features two thrilling modes: Bottom of the Ninth and Precision Hitter. In Precision Hitter, your objective is to score as many points as possible by perfectly hitting the ball within ten pitches. The closer your shot is to the center, the higher your score. In Bottom of the Ninth, you're two runs behind with just three outs left, and it's up to you to lead your team to victory.

If you have any questions about our ESPN Arcade Baseball game extension or just want to give us some feedback, feel free to send us a message or write a review! 

If you wish to remove this extension, follow this steps:
1. Click the 3-dot icon at the top-right corner of your screen.
2. Hover your mouse on More tools then click Extensions.
3. Find the ESPN Arcade Baseball game extension.
4. Press "Remove"
